boat.full_description: Early Bill Baily built GRP Lune whammel, with a Gunter sloop rig from a Drascombe Lugger an 18 feet  boat . Douglas fir 16 feet heavy mast,  gunter spar, loose footed main sail, bow sprit, new halyard for mainsail, new standing rigging,  long shallow keel 19 inches aft, painted GRP hull, foredeck with washboards, bow sprit ,  undergoing a repaint inside & outside, sound hull, ply floor boards, large barn door style rudder with wooden tiller, new bung in keel fitted, outboard well, French  braked trailer that cost £3000 in October 2022 purchased in the UK. Price for boat  is £1250 & trailer  is £1250. The boat can be sold without the trailer. The trailer cannot be sold without the boat. . Can deliver in UK for fuel & expenses.Tel:01556-660007 or 07399552192 email:dhart503@btinternet.com
